name: 30 Seconds (Beta)
description:
30 Seconds is a precise platformer in witch you need to complete each section in 30 seconds.  This game is currently in development so it currently only has two segments please leave feedback in the comments.

A, D, Left Arrow and Right Arrow to move left and right

Shift to grab on to wall

Space To Jump

R to restart 

S to use the glitch Ability!
